description: When services report their status to the scheduler, the logs are filled with the body of the service status, which can be several K of data. This makes it difficult to locate actual useful messages that would help debug problems.
title: Scheduler clogs up logging with too much noise

comments.content: When services report their status to the scheduler, the logs are filled with the body of the service status, which can be several K of data. This makes it difficult to locate actual useful messages that would help debug problems.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-leafe
